review_title: Good place to start and learn IT support knowledge
pros:
- Flexible working environment, nice co-workers, and get to know how an IT department operates in everyday fashion.
- Also get the opportunity to talk to various researchers while helping them with IT support ticket. A lot of fun facts to learn and may lead to other career opportunities.
cons: - Project management and planning can be more organized and improved.

pros:
Very comfortable environment, flexible time, and nice people.
Will learn a lot about the industry from a institute perspective.
cons:
Distance traveled is a bit long from the place where I lived. 
Hard to find a store that sell good food with reasonable price.
